project_description: A simple Flutter app that switches between displaying a cat with a clock icon and a dog with a person icon when the text is clicked.
architecture_overview: The project follows a modular architecture with separate folders for screens, cubits, models, and widgets. Cubit pattern is used for state management.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: Entry point of the application. It sets up the BlocProvider and displays the HomeScreen.

files.name: lib/cubits/animal_cubit.dart
files.description: Defines the AnimalCubit which manages the state of the displayed animal (either cat or dog).

methods.name: toggleAnimal
methods.description: Toggles the displayed animal between cat and dog.

files.name: lib/models/animal_model.dart
files.description: Defines the Animal model which represents the type of animal and its associated icon.

files.name: lib/screens/home_screen.dart
files.description: Defines the HomeScreen which displays the AnimalWidget and manages the UI interactions.

files.name: lib/widgets/animal_widget.dart
files.description: Defines the AnimalWidget which displays the current animal and its icon.

widgets.name: AnimalWidget
widgets.description: Displays the current animal and its icon.

cubits.name: AnimalCubit
cubits.description: Manages the state of the displayed animal.

methods.name: toggleAnimal
methods.description: Toggles the displayed animal between cat and dog.

models.name: Animal
models.description: Represents the type of animal and its associated icon.

dependencies.name: flutter_bloc
dependencies.purpose: State management using the Cubit pattern.

dependencies.name: bloc
dependencies.purpose: State management using the Cubit pattern.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
participant HomeScreen
participant AnimalCubit
participant AnimalWidget
User -> HomeScreen: Click on animal text
HomeScreen -> AnimalCubit: toggleAnimal()
AnimalCubit --> AnimalCubit: Change state
AnimalCubit -> HomeScreen: State updated
HomeScreen -> AnimalWidget: Update UI
@enduml
state_management_flow: The AnimalCubit manages the state of the displayed animal. When the user clicks on the animal text, the toggleAnimal method in the cubit is called, which toggles the animal between cat and dog. The UI is then updated to reflect the current state.
navigation_flow: The app consists of a single screen (HomeScreen). No additional navigation is required.
